heading: HR00595
0: A RESOLUTION URGING CONGRESS TO TASK THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES TO REGULATE USE OF SKY LANTERN TO STAVE OFF THEIR POSSIBLE ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARDS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING CONGRESS TO TASK THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES TO REGULATE USE OF SKY LANTERN TO STAVE OFF THEIR POSSIBLE ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARDS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
